A

addObject(MessageMailbox) - Method in class com.mrjaffesclass.apcs.messages.MessageObject
Subscribes a controller to this message Input: MessageController mc: Controller that is subscribing to this message

C

com.mrjaffesclass.apcs.messages - package com.mrjaffesclass.apcs.messages
This package implements a messaging system used for communication between Model, View, and Controller in a program using an MVC framework.

G

Getter function for the message name

messageHandler(String, Object) - Method in class com.mrjaffesclass.apcs.messages.MessageControllerTest
Method that is fired when a message is sent that this controller is subscribed to.
messageHandler(String, Object) - Method in interface com.mrjaffesclass.apcs.messages.MessageMailbox
Fired when a message is sent through the Messages class that this controller has subscribed to.
MessageMailbox - Interface in com.mrjaffesclass.apcs.messages
Implement this interface for the class that wants to subscribe to messages.
MessageObject - Class in com.mrjaffesclass.apcs.messages

MessageTest - Class in com.mrjaffesclass.apcs.messages
Test runner for Messages Instantiating the class will create three test controllers.
MessageTest() - Constructor for class com.mrjaffesclass.apcs.messages.MessageTest

Call to send a message to the controllers that have subscribed
notify(String, Object, boolean) - Method in class com.mrjaffesclass.apcs.messages.Messaging
